languages.text: "Это была линза, подобная тем, что мы видели в системе Райкад, но меньшая и куда более сильная. Я сразу узнала орудие Архиврага. Я видела подобные раньше, на... на Салис Прайм, планете, где искала святую реликвию и где меня едва не убили культисты! О, как же много мне открылось в этот миг. Как внезапно я поняла, как именно еретики оказались на планете, известной только роду фон Валанциус".

traits.locale_text: "Это была линза, подобная тем, что мы видели в системе Райкад, но меньшая и куда более сильная. Я сразу узнала орудие Архиврага. Я видела подобные раньше, на... на Салис Прайм, планете, где искала святую реликвию и где меня едва не убили культисты! О, как же много мне открылось в этот миг. Как внезапно я поняла, как именно еретики оказались на планете, известной только роду фон Валанциус".
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "It was a lens like the ones we saw in the Rykad System, except it was smaller and far more potent. I instantly knew it to be a weapon of the Archenemy. I had seen objects like it before... on Salis Prime, the planet where I had sought the sacred relic and where I had nearly died at the hands of cultists! So many things were made clear to me in that moment. So piercing was the revelation, so obvious the answer to how those heretics had found their way to a planet known to none but those of House von Valancius!"
languages.original_text: "Это была линза, подобная тем, что мы видели в системе Райкад, но меньшая и куда более сильная. Я сразу узнала орудие Архиврага. Я видела подобные раньше, на... на Салис Прайм, планете, где искала святую реликвию и где меня едва не убили культисты! О, как же много мне открылось в этот миг. Как внезапно я поняла, как именно еретики оказались на планете, известной только роду фон Валанциус".

traits.locale_text: "It was a lens, like the ones we saw in the Rykad System, but smaller and far more potent. I recognised a weapon of the Archenemy in a single glance. I had seen objects like that before... on Salis Prime, the planet where I sought the sacred relic and where I nearly died at the hands of cultists! So many things were made clear to me in that moment. So piercing was the revelation, so obvious the answer to how those heretics had found their way to a planet known to none but those of House von Valancius!"

I had seen objects like it before... on Salis Prime, the planet where I had sought the sacred relic and where I had nearly died at the hands of cultists! So many things were made clear to me in that moment. So piercing was the revelation, so obvious the answer to how those heretics had found their way to a planet known to none but those of House von Valancius!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「ライカド星系で見たものと同じレンズだったけど、小型ではるかに強力だった。一目で、渾沌の勢力の武器だとわかったわ。 以前に同じようなものを見たことがあるの…神聖な遺物を探し、魔女団の手で殺されかけた惑星、サリス・プライムでね！ その瞬間、たくさんのことがハッキリ分かった。突き刺すような啓示だったわ。あの異端者たちがどうやってフォン・ヴァランシウス家の者たち以外には知られていない惑星にたどり着いたのか、その答えは明白だったのよ！」
languages.original_text: "It was a lens like the ones we saw in the Rykad System, except it was smaller and far more potent. I instantly knew it to be a weapon of the Archenemy. I had seen objects like it before... on Salis Prime, the planet where I had sought the sacred relic and where I had nearly died at the hands of cultists! So many things were made clear to me in that moment. So piercing was the revelation, so obvious the answer to how those heretics had found their way to a planet known to none but those of House von Valancius!"

traits.locale_text: 「ライカド星系で見たものと同じレンズだったけど、小型ではるかに強力だった。一目で、渾沌の勢力の武器だとわかったわ。 以前に同じようなものを見たことがあるの…神聖な遺物を探し、魔女団の手で殺されかけた惑星、サリス・プライムでね！ その瞬間、たくさんのことがハッキリ分かった。突き刺すような啓示だったわ。あの異端者たちがどうやってフォン・ヴァランシウス家の者たち以外には知られていない惑星にたどり着いたのか、その答えは明白だったのよ！」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “那是一面透镜，与我们在莱卡德星系中看到的透镜一样。只不过，那枚透镜体积更小、威力更强。我一眼就认出了那是混沌大敌的武器，我以前曾见过那样的东西……在萨利斯主星。我曾踏上那颗行星寻找圣物，但却差点死在邪教徒的手上！在那一刻，我突然明白了很多事情。我突然意识到，为什么那个地方明明只有冯·瓦兰修斯家族的人才知道，可邪教徒却早早地在那里进行了埋伏。这个答案是那么尖锐，那么明显！”
languages.original_text: "It was a lens like the ones we saw in the Rykad System, except it was smaller and far more potent. I instantly knew it to be a weapon of the Archenemy. I had seen objects like it before... on Salis Prime, the planet where I had sought the sacred relic and where I had nearly died at the hands of cultists! So many things were made clear to me in that moment. So piercing was the revelation, so obvious the answer to how those heretics had found their way to a planet known to none but those of House von Valancius!"

traits.locale_text: “那是一面透镜，与我们在莱卡德星系中看到的透镜一样。只不过，那枚透镜体积更小、威力更强。我一眼就认出了混沌大敌的武器，我以前曾见过那样的东西……在萨利斯主星。我曾踏上那颗行星寻找圣物，但却差点死在邪教徒的手上！在那一刻，我突然明白了很多事情。我突然意识到，为什么那个地方明明只有冯·瓦兰修斯家族的人才知道，可邪教徒却早早地在那里进行了埋伏。这个答案是那么尖锐，那么明显！”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «Era una lente, como las que vimos en el sistema Rykad, salvo que era más pequeña y mucho más potente. Supe que era un arma del Archienemigo nada más verla. Ya había visto objetos así antes... en Salis Prime, el planeta donde busqué la reliquia sagrada y donde casi muero a manos de los cultistas. En aquel momento vi las cosas más claras. ¡Tan fuerte fue la revelación como obvia la respuesta a cómo aquellos herejes habían encontrado el camino a un planeta que solo conocían los pertenecientes a la casa von Valancius!».
languages.original_text: "It was a lens like the ones we saw in the Rykad System, except it was smaller and far more potent. I instantly knew it to be a weapon of the Archenemy. I had seen objects like it before... on Salis Prime, the planet where I had sought the sacred relic and where I had nearly died at the hands of cultists! So many things were made clear to me in that moment. So piercing was the revelation, so obvious the answer to how those heretics had found their way to a planet known to none but those of House von Valancius!"

traits.locale_text: «Era una lente, como las que vimos en el sistema Rykad, salvo que era más pequeña y mucho más potente. Reconocí un arma del Archienemigo de un solo vistazo. Ya había visto objetos así antes... en Salis Prime, el planeta donde busqué la reliquia sagrada y donde casi muero a manos de los cultistas. En aquel momento vi las cosas más claras. ¡Tan fuerte fue la revelación como obvia la respuesta a cómo aquellos herejes habían encontrado el camino a un planeta que solo conocían los pertenecientes a la casa von Valancius!».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Es war eine Linse, wie die, die wir im Rykad-System gesehen haben. Nur war sie kleiner und viel mächtiger. Ich erkannte sie sofort als Waffe des Erzfeindes. Ich hatte solche Objekte schon einmal gesehen ... auf Salis Prime, dem Planeten, wo ich nach dem heiligen Relikt gesucht hatte und fast von Kultisten ermordet worden war! In diesem Augenblick sind mir so viele Dinge klar geworden. So durchdringend war die Offenbarung, so offensichtlich die Antwort darauf, wie die Ketzer auf einen Planeten gefunden hatten, der nur dem Haus Valancius bekannt gewesen war!"
languages.original_text: "It was a lens like the ones we saw in the Rykad System, except it was smaller and far more potent. I instantly knew it to be a weapon of the Archenemy. I had seen objects like it before... on Salis Prime, the planet where I had sought the sacred relic and where I had nearly died at the hands of cultists! So many things were made clear to me in that moment. So piercing was the revelation, so obvious the answer to how those heretics had found their way to a planet known to none but those of House von Valancius!"

traits.locale_text: "Es war eine Linse, wie die, die wir im Rykad-System gesehen haben. Nur war sie kleiner und viel mächtiger. Ich habe mit einem Blick eine Waffe des Erzfeinds erkannt. Ich hatte solche Objekte schon einmal gesehen ... auf Salis Prime, dem Planeten, wo ich nach dem heiligen Relikt gesucht hatte und fast von Kultisten ermordet worden war! In diesem Augenblick sind mir so viele Dinge klar geworden. So durchdringend war die Offenbarung, so offensichtlich die Antwort darauf, wie die Ketzer auf einen Planeten gefunden hatten, der nur dem Haus Valancius bekannt gewesen war!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « C'était une sorte de lentille, semblable à celles que nous avons vues dans le système de Rykad, mais plus petite et bien plus puissante. Un seul regard m'a suffi à comprendre qu'il s'agissait d'une arme du Grand Ennemi. J'avais déjà vu de tels objets... sur Salis Primus, la planète sur laquelle j'avais cherché la relique sacrée, et où j'avais failli mourir aux mains des cultistes ! En un instant, tout est devenu clair. Moi qui m'étais demandé comment ces hérétiques avaient pu trouver une planète dont personne à part la maison von Valancius ne connaissait l'existence, j'avais enfin ma réponse ! »
languages.original_text: "It was a lens like the ones we saw in the Rykad System, except it was smaller and far more potent. I instantly knew it to be a weapon of the Archenemy. I had seen objects like it before... on Salis Prime, the planet where I had sought the sacred relic and where I had nearly died at the hands of cultists! So many things were made clear to me in that moment. So piercing was the revelation, so obvious the answer to how those heretics had found their way to a planet known to none but those of House von Valancius!"

traits.locale_text: « C'était une sorte de lentille, semblable à celles que nous avons vues dans le système de Rykad, mais plus petite, et bien plus puissante. Un seul regard m'a suffi à comprendre qu'il s'agissait d'une arme du Grand Ennemi. J'avais déjà vu de tels objets... sur Salis Primus, la planète sur laquelle j'avais cherché la relique sacrée, et où j'avais manqué mourir aux mains des cultistes ! En un instant, tout est devenu clair. Moi qui m'étais demandé comment ces hérétiques avaient pu trouver une planète dont personne à part la maison von Valancius ne connaissait l'existence, j'avais enfin ma réponse ! »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Rykad Sistemi'nde gördüklerimize benzer bir tür mercekti. Ancak daha küçük ve çok daha kudretliydi. Şerbaşı'nın silahı olduğunu anında anlamıştım. Emsallerini daha evvel... Kutsal yadigârı bulmak için gidip neredeyse tarikatçıların elinde öldüğüm gezegende, Salis Prime'da görmüştüm! O vakit gözlerimde her şey ayyuka çıktı. Bu vaziyet öyle acı, o kâfirlerin von Valancius Hanesi mensupları dışında kimsenin yolunu bilmediği bir gezegene nasıl vardığının cevabı öyle barizdi ki!"
languages.original_text: "It was a lens like the ones we saw in the Rykad System, except it was smaller and far more potent. I instantly knew it to be a weapon of the Archenemy. I had seen objects like it before... on Salis Prime, the planet where I had sought the sacred relic and where I had nearly died at the hands of cultists! So many things were made clear to me in that moment. So piercing was the revelation, so obvious the answer to how those heretics had found their way to a planet known to none but those of House von Valancius!"

traits.locale_text: "Rykad Sistemi'nde gördüklerimize benzer bir tür mercekti. Ancak bu daha küçük ve çok daha kudretliydi. Şerbaşı'nın silahı olduğunu anında anlamıştım. Emsallerini daha evvel de görmüştüm... Kutsal yadigârı bulmak için gidip neredeyse tarikatçıların elinde öldüğüm gezegende, Salis Prime'da! O vakit gözlerimde her şey ayyuka çıktı. Bu vaziyet öyle acı; o kâfirlerin von Valancius Hanesi mensupları dışında kimsenin yolunu bilmediği bir gezegene nasıl vardığının cevabı öyle barizdi ki!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
